definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

pinyin: Hua2 tie3 lu2 huo3 che1 zhan4

sentences.english: Apparel Commodity do business in the city railway station on this one.
sentences.chinese: 做服裝小商品的商貿城就在火車站這一塊。

sentences.english: When we got to the railway station, the train had left.
sentences.chinese: 我們到火車站時，火車已經開走了。

sentences.english: He ran to the station only to find the train had left.
sentences.chinese: 他跑到火車站卻發現火車已開走。

sentences.english: The bus for the railroad station, I think it's no. 36.
sentences.chinese: 乘開往火車站的大衆汽車，我想是36路吧。

sentences.english: So when we got to the railway station I was all a-quiver.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們到達火車站的時候，我們真是膽戰心驚。

sentences.english: Marylebone Station was packed with homeward- bound commuters.
sentences.chinese: 馬裏列本火車站擠滿了要回家去的旅客。

sentences.english: Early one morning, they took a taxi to Beijing West Railway Station.
sentences.chinese: 第一個早晨，他們坐計程車到北京西火車站。

sentences.english: The bunch of teenagers who spend their afternoons smoking in the local railway station?
sentences.chinese: 一羣整個下午都在本地火車站抽菸的小青年？

sentences.english: The policeman conducted us safely to the railway station.
sentences.chinese: 警察把我們安全地護送到火車站。

sentences.english: Every morning, he used a lorry to carry the lumbers to the railway station.
sentences.chinese: 每天上午，他用一輛卡車裝運木材去火車站。

sentences.english: We went to Yidu Railway Station accompanied by the woman platoon leader.
sentences.chinese: 女生排長隨車陪送我們來到了益都火車站。

sentences.english: The travelers detrained at the railway station.
sentences.chinese: 旅客們在火車站上下了車。

sentences.english: It was like the ceiling of Grand Central Terminal, but seemed even closer.
sentences.chinese: 天空很像中央火車站的天頂，只是好像離得更近。

sentences.english: As more people arrived, the station began to crackle with expectant, nervous energy.
sentences.chinese: 更多的人到達了，火車站開始熱鬧起來。

sentences.english: It was in the waiting room of the railway station that I met my English teacher for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 我是在火車站候車室裏第一次見到我的英語老師的。

sentences.english: Hise is home near the station.

definition: travel time/expected time for a car journey
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
to ride (in a vehicle)/to get a lift/to hitch-hike
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
